script.line: What! It worked!
As the prophecy foretold.
Bark bark!
Minty! What a day you've had!
But now you're back in my arms, right where you belong!
Of course she is. She was always fated to be.
Wow, Yung Sphinx! You're one heck of a cheerleader.
A...cheerleader?
Yeah! If you hadn't come along, I'd probably still be questioning everything...
And Prota wouldn't have her pup back!
It's true!
You cheered me on to victory. And it meant the world!
But... all that I did was tell you that things would go well.
Yeah. And sometimes that's all you need! Just knowing you're gonna be okay if you take the leap.
Fascinating. For what it is worth... I enjoyed witnessing your success. And I wish you more in the future.
Aw! That's so sweet of you!
Ha! Look at you, Yung Sphinx, you're all shy.
I AM NOT SHY!
I think it's cute!
Bark!
I mean, somebody as cool as you's probably got a lot of friends already...
...Of course. Yes. Many. Many friends.
Well, if you've ever got room for one more, count me in! Or else I could just pay you for life coaching...
Hmm.
I WOULD LIKE TO BE YOUR FRIEND!
Ha ha! Okay! I love the Enthusiasm. I was just about to head over to MaizeMutts and grab a corn dog! You wanna tag along?
Very much!
Great! How about you, Prota?
I'd better head off and see my parents. But thanks again. I'll see you soon!
Yeah you will!
I know this to be a fact.
